borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Variation of condition 2 of planning permission ref: 2024/03258/FUL granted 24th February 2025 for the 'Erection of a rear extension at third floor level over part of the existing back addition; erection of a first floor rear extension; erection of new railings to existing roof terrace at third floor level; installation of a new rooflight above the main flat roof at roof level; installation of new widened French doors and a Juliet balcony to replace the existing in the rear roofslope; installation of a new rooflight above the main flat roof at roof level; infilling of the existing rooflight in the rear roofslope; installation of French doors with a Juliet balcony to replace the existing window to the rear elevation, infilling of the existing window and installation of a new window re-positioned to the side of rear back addition at second floor level; installation of a new window to the side of rear back addition at first floor level; alterations to the rear fenestration to include replacement of existing French doors and windows with new aluminium framed sliding doors at ground floor level to the rear elevation; alterations to the roof of single storey back addition to include the replacement of existing rooflights with new rooflights and increasing the height by 400mm; replacement of existing windows with new windows; formation of a bin store to front of the property; alterations to front boundary wall to include the erection of new railings and installation of a pedestrian entrance gate to replace the existing' to allow amendments to the approved drawings to include: increasing the height of rear parapet wall above the roof of ground floor rear back addition by 135mm.
